hd.text: $t(simulation, {'count': {{numSims}} }) performed to generate this high quality simulation

message.bulk: Bulk importing {{num}} pokemon, this may take a bit
message.deleteAll: Removing all Pokemon from your Pokebox
message.network: Network error. Network connection is required for this app.
message.serverDown: Pokebattler servers are down. They will be back shortly

message.newVersion: A new version is available, reload your browser.
message.newAppVersion: New update is downloaded, updating in 15s...

spinner.battle: Simulating combat results. This shouldn't take long
spinner.raid: Searching through all possible attackers to find the best counters. This shouldn't take long.
spinner.pokedex: Finding best attack matchups and counters. This might take a second.
spinner.rankings: Finding the best Pokemon by simulating combat between every single Pokemon matchup available. This will take a bit.

patreon.ad2: Multi month Pokebattler subscriptions are a great value
patreon.ad3: Optimize your Raids. Sign up for Pokebattler Standard Plan for more accurate results and special features.
patreon.ad4: Love Pokebattler? Subscribe today and get more space, better results, exclusive tools and more.
patreon.ad5: Pokebattler is made possible by our supporters.
patreon.ad6: Take your gaming to the next level with a Pokebattler Subscription. Sign up now.

description.gym: Gym Battle Simulations, Pokedex and Rankings
description.raids: Top Counters, Raid Battle Party Simulations and Power Up Advice
description.pvp: Pvp News, Rankings, Pokedex and Simulations
description.pvppokedex: $t(pvp) Counters and Matchups  for every Pokemon
description.pvprankings: Top Counters and Matchups for $t(pvp) Leagues and Silph Cup
description.pvpmatrix: Custom Results Of Your Pokemon Vs. Their Pokemon
description.account: Customize Pokebattler By Adding Pokemon To Your Pokebox and Battle Parties
description.profiles: Find what Pokemon your friends have in their Pokebox
description.more: News, Articles, Translations, How To Contact Us and More

tooltip.gym: Gym battle simulations, Pokedex, attacker and defender rankings and more for Pokemon Go
tooltip.raids: Find the top counters, do full raid simulations, get advice on which Pokemon to Power Up and more for Pokemon Go Raids
tooltip.pvp: See what happens if you battle your friends
tooltip.more: Read News and articles, download  infographics, help translate for us, about us, and privacy policy for Pokebattler for Pokemon Go

randomAssistants.title: Extra Random Trainers
randomAssistants.description: The number of additional random trainers to help you beat the boss. For tier 4 and 5 raid bosses, 5 random battle parties assist you with the fight by default.

numParty.title: Party Power
numParty.description: The number of players in your party who are in the raid with you.

numMegas.title: Additional Megas
numMegas.description: The number of additional megas brought by other players. Megas will be staggered to increase the uptime of the mega buff.

explicitAssistants.title: Extra Trainers
explicitAssistants.description: The number of additional trainers to help you beat the boss. You choose the battle parties for each of these attackers. The friend level should be the maximum friend level that they have with other players at the raid, not your friend level with them.

monteCarlo.title: Simulation Type
monteCarlo.description: Choose between running a single random simulation, or the average of multiple simulations

errors.title: Uhoh! You found a bug
errors.description: Pokebattler.com tries it's best to be as bug free as possible and can use your help! There are a virtually infinite number of possible URLs on the site and we can't test them all. We rely on your reports to find and fix problems.
errors.fix: Usually this error will go away if you click on Pokebattler in the top left and then click reload.
errors.autoReport: The following information regarding this error has been reported automatically.
errors.contactUs: If you wish to contact us regarding the error, please send the following information to
errors.small: Usually this error will go away if you click on Pokebattler in the top left and then click reload. Information regarding this error has been reported to us

loading.error: Sorry, there was a problem loading the page. Check your connection
